mapper.select: SELECT empno, ename, job, sal, hiredate, loc, dname FROM emp AS e INNER JOIN dept AS d ON e.deptno = d.deptno
SELECT ename, ifnull(sal, 100) AS sal, ifnull(comm, 0) AS comm FROM emp WHERE empno = #{empno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emp( empno, ename, comm, sal,deptno) VALUES (#{empno},#{ename},#{comm},#{sal},#{deptno})
